Info.Title: The Possession of Michael King
Info.Writer: David Jung (screenplay), David Jung (story), Tedi Sarafian (story)
Info.Actors: Shane Johnson, Ella Anderson, Cara Pifko, Julie McNiven
Info.Plot: After poor advice from a psychic leads to the death of his wife, a man vows to disprove the existence of the paranormal by allowing himself to be possessed by demons.
